The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Erik Gund or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth4@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15106278

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
**The Role:** 
 Software Engineer
   

  

**The Team**
 The development team is based in Stockholm and consists of 22 highly skilled individuals with diverse backgrounds, each engineer playing their unique part in serving our global customer base. Everyone on the team shares the responsibility of meeting all functional and non-functional requirements, and you’ll find that the team decisions cover not only business-related improvements but also a wide variety of technical topics such as architectural styles, Kubernetes operators, deployment pipelines, data locality strategies, observability solutions, frontend frameworks and much much more. The team is responsible for a complex system requiring a lot of collaboration within the team and with other parts of the technology organisation and we value learning from each other in order to continuously improve ourselves and the user experience.
   

  

**The Impact**
 OSTTRA is a FinTech company at the heart of the global financial system, dedicated to building the future of post-trade. OSTTRA triResolve Margin is our post-trade service that offers an automated workflow for the margin call process as well as a system for managing collateral. Improvement of OSTTRA triResolve Margin has far-reaching effects in this important segment of the financial industry, not only through expanded capabilities of other integrated OSTTRA services, but also directly through operational efficiency improvements and cost reductions for many of the largest banks in the world.
   

  

**What’s In It For You**
* Influence the future of a market-leading solution together with highly skilled people across the globe
* Work in an empowered engineering team with people that want you to succeed
* Learn about the financial industry and contribute to the stability of the global financial system
* Expand your technical skill set by working in a modern tech stack


**Responsibilities**
* Actively contribute to the development and architecture of the system to meet new and changing business needs
* Ensure that non-functional requirements are established and met
* Be part of the team taking care of the overall system health
* Engage in continuous learning to keep up with industry best practices


**What We’re Looking For**
* A master’s degree in computer science or a similar field
* 1-3 years of relevant experience
* Excellent communication skills (fluency in English is a must)
* A bold and humble team player
* A desire to work in a modern tech stack including, but not limited to Python, Elm, NoSQL/SQL databases, Docker and Kubernetes
* Business-mindedness and a solution-oriented mindset
* An aptitude and willingness to improve yourself, others around you and our ways of working.
* Availability to work at the office at least 3 days per week (mandatory requirement)


**We also prefer if you have one or more of the following:**
* An interest in financial markets
* A passion for technology


**About OSTTRA**
*Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.*
 OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.
   

  

 With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.
   

  

 Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.
   

  

 Learn more at www.osttra.com.
   

  

**What’s In It For** 
**You?**
**Benefits**
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include**
* Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description:
**Company Overview:** 




 We are a leading IT company based in Stockholm, specializing in cutting-edge software solutions for clients across various industries. Our dynamic and innovative team is dedicated to delivering high-quality products that drive business success. We are currently seeking a highly skilled Senior Full-Stack Developer to join our growing team. 
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 
  
 


* Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable applications using Java, Kotlin, and Spring Boot.
* Utilize Maven for project management and build automation.
* Implement and monitor metrics and logs using Prometheus, Grafana, Victoria Metrics, and Loki.
* Develop and maintain messaging systems leveraging Kafka and MQTT.
* Build and enhance user interfaces with React and AngularJS.
* Collaborate with the DevOps team to ensure seamless integration and deployment using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions.



  





**Required Qualifications:** 
  
 


* Proficiency in Java, Kotlin, and Spring Boot.
* Experience with Prometheus, Grafana, Victoria Metrics, and Loki.
* Strong knowledge of messaging platforms such as Kafka and MQTT.
* Expertise in frontend development with React and AngularJS.
* Hands-on experience with DevOps tools, specifically Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 
  
 


* Familiarity with AWS services (EC2, Route53, S3, etc.).
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP).



  





**What We Offer:** 
  
 


* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work in a collaborative and innovative environment.
* Continuous professional development and career advancement opportunities.



  





**How to Apply:** 
 Please submit your resume and cover letter to alina.levin@sudosweden.com with the subject line "Senior Full-Stack Developer Application – [Your Name]". 
 



  





 Join us in shaping the future of technology in Stockholm and beyond!

title: Software Developer for Ventures and New Business
description:
**About Us**
 Everyone working at Scania are united by a common purpose: Driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. We know that the transport industry must change, and it’s a change we want to lead. Scania’s continuous transformative work within circularity, electrification and autonomy shows commercial ideas, powerful insights and competencies that make real change happen.
   

  

 Ventures and New Business at Scania have a key role in driving the shift and contributing to this vision. We develop and deliver new businesses, supporting Scania’s long-term growth and profitability ambitions. At Ventures and New Business, we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments that strengthen and support our acceleration, driving the shift. We want to engage and inspire our entire organisation to create results together with us, and collaboration and entrepreneurial spirit are part of our culture and what makes us successful.
   

  

 We are today a team of approximate 45+ people and have five ventures. Our office space is very central at Drottninggatan in Stockholm.
   

  

**Job Description**
 A Venture Software Developer is a pivotal team member in new business ventures, responsible for designing, building, and maintaining software solutions that drive innovation and growth. This role involves working closely with cross-functional teams to develop scalable, high-performance applications that meet the needs of emerging startups.
   

  

 You will work in one of our ventures and report to our Tech Domain Manager.
   

  

 Key responsibilities
   

  

 In the role of Venture Software Developer your key responsibilites will be:
   

  

  

* Software Development: Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code for various applications and platforms, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
* System Design: Collaborating with architects and other developers to design system architecture and technical specifications that align with business objectives.
* Product Development: Participating in the full software development lifecycle, including requirement analysis, design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
* Innovation: Leveraging the latest technologies and development practices to create innovative solutions that provide a competitive edge.
* Problem-Solving: Identifying and resolving technical challenges, optimizing performance, and ensuring robust and secure applications.
* Collaboration: Working closely with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver solutions that meet user needs.
* Continuous Improvement: Staying up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously improve skills and contribute to the venture’s success.


**About You**
 We seek someone with strong experience within software development. It is important that you are a positive influence and a good collaborator as you will interact with a wide array of internal and external stakeholders. Good communication skills are key since you will be interacting closely with business executives both across the company and externally. You are a goal-oriented doer and a team player that loves to see how our business is growing.
   

  

 We also believe that you (requirements):
   

  

  

* 5+ years of experience from software development within Python
* Front-end capabilities: While back-end is your bread and butter, practical experience with front-end frameworks and languages will be considered an asset
* AWS specialist, you have experience from building, securing, and operate systems using AWS services like ECS, RDS, S3, EC2, and Lambda
* DevOps proficiency: You thrive in DevOps teams and possess a deep understanding of CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Infrastructure as Code.
* Thrive in in a fast-growing company
* Are fluent in English


 What we offer:
   

  

 We offer you the chance to be part of an organisation that is focused on reaching Scania’s targets and truly driving the shift to a sustainable transport system. With the opportunities of the current transformative changes within the transport industry, we are on a very exciting journey. This is the right time to join us!
   

  

 Information and application
   

  

 Questions about the role? Contact linda.rosenqvist@scania.com.
   

  

 We are working with an ongoing selection; please apply as soon as possible if you are interested, but no later than 2024-10-07
   

  

 Kindly note that a background check might be conducted for this position.
   

  

*Scania is one of Sweden's largest companies and offers trucks and buses for heavy transport in combination with a wide range of product-related services. Our mission is to drive the transition to a sustainable transport system by developing safe, smart and energy-efficient transport solutions that are better for both people and our planet. Today, Scania have around 50,000 employees in around 100 countries. For more information visit Scania.com*

title: Sharepoint developer
description:
**Role:**
 You will design and build a good search experience for SharePoint Online content together with developers in the intranet team to fulfill a business need to improve and consolidate information search.
   

  

 The work includes analyzing, designing, and developing a scalable solution that can be used to further index relevant SharePoint Online content for intranet search.
   

  

****Essential requirements:****
* You have several years of experience working with SharePoint and OneDrive in a global organization.
* You are senior expert and developer for SharePoint Online and have an in-depth technical experience of the different features, possibilities and boundaries within SharePoint, for it to be used to its full potential.
* You are used to both designs, develop and implement solutions with SharePoint Online according to Microsoft best practices in global organizations.
* You have deep knowledge in SharePoint Online and M365 search and know how to build integrations using App registrations including utilizing suitable APIs to gather and consolidate data.
* Together with Intranet developers you will investigate, design and build a solution where SharePoint consolidated data will be captured and further indexed to Intranet search.
* You appreciate an open and transparent environment where everyone’s opinion matters, and you enjoy cross team collaboration and value creation


**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** 
**when applying.**

**:**

 Stockholm

title: Turnpikes söker utvecklare!
description:
Är du passionerad inom IT och söker nya utmaningar? Turnpikes erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du kan växa och utvecklas tillsammans med ett team av engagerade kollegor. Välkommen till ett företag i framkant av teknik och innovation!
 


  

  

  

  


  

**Företag :**
 Turnpikes Sweden Filial
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Turnpikes är en talangfull grupp människor med huvudkontor i Danmark men verksamma över hela världen, som möjliggör digital transformation för företagskunder. Turnpikes värdesätter sina starka relationer, strävar alltid efter att skapa värde och är stolta över sin extremt höga kundnöjdhet från några av världens största företag.
 


  


 Med en ständigt växande kundbas har behovet av ytterligare expansion blivit tydligt. Nu söker vi utvecklare som i en bred roll kommer få ta stort ansvar gentemot den svenska kundbasen. Du kommer att arbeta med tekniska uppgifter relaterade till OpenText Extended ECM (Enterprise Content Management) och leverera kvalitativa konfigurationer till projektteamet som definierar omfattningen och interagerar med slutkunden.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En fot in på ett företag vars tillväxtstrategi är ambitiös och där du får utrymme att växa i karriären
  
* Tydliga utvecklingsplaner och en platt struktur som ger dig tillgång till en stor kunskapsbas
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med banbrytande teknologi och branschledande lösningar
  
* Omfattande förmånspaket
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Arbeta med definierade uppgifter i OpenText Extended ECM, som Web Reports, arbetsflöden, arkivhantering, etc.
  
* Leverera hög kvalitet i konfigurationer, utvecklingar och relaterad dokumentation.
  
* Samarbeta i ett större projektteam och kommunicera med dina kollegor på olika platser i världen.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en relevant universitetsutbildning inom IT
  
* Har en god generell teknisk förståelse
  
* Har erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
  
* Har grundläggande erfarenhet av databashantering
  
* Kan kommunicera väl på både svenska och engelska
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Stresstolerant
  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Intellektuellt nyfiken
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Turnpikes Sweden Filial**

 Här kan du läsa mer om Turnpikes.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Turnpikes Sweden Filial**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på mikaela.hofstedt@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105555

title: Senior Web Developer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Jigsaw. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Jigsaw is searching for a PHP expert who thrives in fast-paced environments and is eager to drive technological advancements in the software industry. This role is ideal for someone who excels in PHP development and is passionate about leading teams towards innovation.
   

  

 The software industry often suffers from the slow pace of adopting new technologies and methodologies. At Jigsaw, we distinguish ourselves by rapidly embracing and implementing the latest cloud and PHP technologies. As our subject matter expert, you will be a catalyst in accelerating this shift, moving away from conventional development processes to more agile, efficient practices.
   

  

 Your role will involve leading the development and delivery of cutting-edge PHP solutions both in front-end and back-end services. Your expertise in PHP development will not only contribute to the creation of advanced software solutions, but also drive the strategic direction of our product offerings. You'll play a pivotal role in ensuring our solutions align with client needs and industry trends.
   

  

 Joining Jigsaw means becoming part of a dynamic, forward-thinking company where innovative ideas are valued and professional growth is encouraged. If you're ready to join us in transforming the software domain, apply now!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Spearheading the development of customer-facing UIs and back-end services using PHP, ensuring scalable and efficient solutions
* Taking ownership of end-to-end project delivery, working closely with cross-functional Agile teams
* Guiding and mentoring a talented engineering team, promoting the use of best practices and fostering a culture of technical excellence


**Basic Requirements**
**Senior Web Developer key responsibilities**
* Must be based in the European Union, United Kingdom, or EEA
* At least 4 years of professional experience in PHP development
* Familiarity with front-end technologies (HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3) and MySQL
* The ability to integrate applications with third-party services using REST APIs with formats like JSON and XML


**About Jigsaw**
 Delivered on a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, Jigsaw’s virtual learning and collaboration technology enables our customers to revolutionize how they train, educate, collaborate and work through a virtual environment – helping them embrace digital transformation and enhance their organizations’ success.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5169-SE-Stockhol-SeniorWebDevel.002

title: Dotnet Backend Developer with Azure DevOps
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Dotnet Backend Developer with Azure DevOps 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our
 **Dotnet Backend Developer with Azure DevOps****
**About VIPAS :**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**What You’ll Do:**
 As a Backend Developer at VIPAS AB, you will:
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain backend services and APIs.
* Collaborate with a cross-functional team to deliver high-quality software solutions.
* Ensure the security, performance, and scalability of applications.
* Work with modern development tools and cloud services to drive efficiency and innovation.


**Competency Requirements:**
 To excel in this role, you should have experience with:
   

  

* C#/.NET programming
* Developing and integrating REST APIs
* Implementing OAuth2 for secure authentication
* Working with Microsoft SQL and Git
* Utilizing Microsoft Azure for cloud services
* At least one CI/CD tool for continuous integration and deployment
* Implementing Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Designing solutions using event-driven architecture


**Meritorious Skills:**
 While not required, experience with the following will be a strong plus:
   

  

* Azure DevOps and Terraform
* Working with Cosmos DB, Azure Functions, and App Services
* Utilizing Azure Service Bus, Azure AD B2C, and Azure Key Vault
* Developing with GraphQL


**What We’re Looking For:**
* Fluent Swedish proficiency, both spoken and written
* A team player who is proactive, innovative, and eager to learn
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathi.hr@vipas.se &contact me at +46764341371/+46 739803973
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Frontend Developer till Sport och Casino
description:
*Vill du arbeta med utveckling på ett bolag med den senaste tekniken och i ett team där vi har kul på jobbet? Vill du arbeta på ett företag med fantastiska produkter som används av mer än 1,3 miljoner kunder? Då är detta rollen för dig!* 




  





**I rollen får du:** 




 • Arbeta med drift och nyutveckling av våra system.
 



 • Vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklingsprocesser.
 



 • Jobba med fantastiska medarbetare i en lärande och utvecklande miljö.
 



  





 Till vårt utvecklingsteam inom Sport och Casino söker vi nu en Senior Frontend utvecklare. I rollen kommer du att arbeta med både drift och nyutveckling av våra system. För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du värdesätter teamarbete men även eget ansvar. Vidare ser vi att du gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om nya tekniska lösningar. Du kommer att vara en del av ett högpresterande team i vår Sport och Casino del där vi har roligt på jobbet. I rollen får du möjlighet att arbeta med de främsta teknikerna och skapa schyssta spelupplevelser för våra kunder. Tjänsten innebär ett tätt samarbete med de övriga utvecklingsteamen.
 



  





**Är det här du?** 




 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och för att lyckas som utvecklare hos oss ser vi att du har högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande inom systemutveckling. Du har god förståelse för agila processer. För att trivas i den här miljön är du en lagspelare som tycker om att samarbeta. Som person är du lyhörd, nyfiken och tycker om utmaningar. Vidare ser vi att du är prestigelös och gillar att dela med dig av din kunskap. Vi söker dig med en god kommunikativ förmåga på både engelska och svenska, eftersom stora delar av arbetet är på engelska. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av utveckling inom storföretag i en transaktionsintensiv bransch, som bank- eller finansverksamhet eller spelbolag. Har du kunskaper inom test så är även det meriterande för rollen.
 



  





 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av:
 



 • React
 



 • Redux
 



 • GraphQL
 



 • TypeScript
 



 • NodeJS
 



 • Micro frontend architecture
 



 • Test och kvalitet
 



  





**”Mitt mål är att bygga hållbara relationer”** 




 Grunden i mitt ledarskap vilar på tillit till individen, god kommunikation och styrkan i teamets förmågor. Mitt mål är att bygga hållbara relationer, trygghet och tillit till varandras kompetens. Min uppgift som ledare är att skapa förutsättningar för att alla individer i teamet ska kunna växa och få utmanande uppgifter. Personligen sätter jag högt värde vid individuell nyfikenhet, engagemang, kompetens, humor, och viljan att äga uppgiften och leverera tillsammans. Jag har varit anställd på ATG sedan 2018 och har förmånen att vara Manager IT för Sport och Casino. Kulturen, människorna och balansen mellan jobb och fritid är något jag värdesätter starkt på ATG.
 



**- Rekryterande chef, Eva Rylander, Manager IT Sport and Casino** 




  





**We are the game** 




 I närmare 50 år har vi på ATG levererat spänning och underhållning till svenska folket. Vi drivs av att trygga den svenska hästnäringen och att fortsatt vara ett ansvarsfullt spelbolag i framkant. Vår vision att leverera världens bästa spelupplevelse. Hos oss är du en del av en innovativ miljö – med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar vi spelupplevelser i världsklass. Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Sedan starten 1974 har vi byggt och förvaltat systemen för våra produkter som hanterar 4 500 000 transaktioner per dag.
 



  





**Join the game!** 




 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
 



  





 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och kommer att göra en bakgrundskontroll för denna roll. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!

title: Business Developer
description:
**BUSINESS DEVELOPER** 




  





**Contract:** 
 Full time, permanent
 



**Location:** 
 Sweden
 



**Salary:** 
 Competitive
 



  





 Are you ready to take the next step in your career? Using the valuable skills and experience you have gained so far you now have the chance to carve a successful, lucrative career in financial services sales with LEYTON.
 



  





 We are looking for ambitious, driven sales focused individuals, looking to grow in their sales career working for the number one company in our sector.
 



  





 If you think you have the drive and ambition to succeed in this fast-paced, dynamic environment, this could be the perfect opportunity for you!
 



  





**The Company:** 




  





 Leyton is a leading consultancy firm with a unique goal: to quickly improve the financial performance of its clients without impacting on their core business. The services offered by Leyton are focused around this goal, and range from innovation financing (through tax incentives as well as grants & subsidies), energy-related services (procurement, certificates), business process outsourcing (for public and private sector), social charges, procurement and tax-related product (VAT,local tax).
 



  





 Leyton is now present in 16 countries (Belgium, Canada France, Italy, Morocco, Netherlands,
 



 Poland, Spain, United Kingdom, Germany, the United States of America, Portugal, Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland) with more than people entirely focused on improving the financial situation of our approx. 40,000 clients.
 



  





**We offer real career opportunities in a fast-growing, friendly firm with a dynamic and ambitious team.** 




  





 Our remuneration package is very attractive and you will be rewarded on the basis of your personal performance, as well as on the basis of the company's overall achievements. For the right candidate, the extensive growth plans for Sweden offer the opportunity to progress quickly in terms of promotion.
 



  





**Function of the role:** 




  





 We service a wide variety of customers across all sectors of industry. Therefore, the Business
 



 Developer role will involve contacting a variety of different businesses. The Business Developers main responsibility is to generate new business accounts through face-to-face sales, telephone lead generation and networking while being supported by a telesales team.
 



  





 To that end, s/he will benefit from Leyton’s experience in developing state-of-the-art sales B2B process designed to scale up rapidly. Although this is a field sales role in a B2B context, we expect the candidate to be able to evolve and grow with the business.
 



  





**Main responsibilities will include:** 




  





 Working in sectors ranging but not limited to Pharmaceutical, Financial, Aerospace,
 



 Automotive, Engineering, Digital Agencies and Software.
 



  





 Generating new business meetings across Sweden, and hence creating a pipeline of new
 



 Business
 


* Assisting and providing guidance to the telesales team
* Cold calling prospective clients
* Conducting the sales process from the first meeting until contract signature
* Methodological follow-up of the sales process in our CRM software.
* Finding key differentiators, and developing a good understanding of the needs of the clients,to prevail in competitive sales process
* Frequent contacts with the consulting team to elaborate a thorough understanding of our offering



  





**Desired experience and skills:** 




  




* Excellent verbal communication skills as well as listening skills to understand clients’ needs
* A natural sales ability; you must be confident and articulate, particularly on the telephone
* The ability to tailor your style and sales pitch to suit a particular opportunity
* Ability to integrate complex services, and being able to articulate it intelligently to the Prospect
* At least 2 years sales experience
* Fluent in both Swedish and English



  





**What we offer:** 




  




* Rapid career growth and progression, within a dynamic rapidly growing organization
* 30 days holidays
* Attractive bonus package
* Private healthcare
* Private pension
* Global established brand that has experienced double digit growth since its inception 25 years ago
* Strong company and result-driven culture with an extremely inclusive atmosphere and a high level of appreciation for meritocracy.



  





 We are proud to have 3000 employees in 33 offices across 16 countries in Europe, North Africa and North America. We have highly qualified teams of consultants in sales, science, tax, engineering and software who are delivering an added value that will help clients finance their innovation.
 



  





 If you're looking for a role which offers a dynamic and friendly environment with like-minded people then please apply now!

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
Vi söker ServiceNow-utvecklare för ett uppdrag hos vår kund. Två positioner behöver fyllas, där du som konsult kommer att designa, utveckla och implementera moduler i kundens ServiceNow-plattform för att förbättra deras system för incidenthantering och felsökning. Uppdraget inkluderar testledning, kravanalys och nära samarbete med beställare för att förstå deras behov.
 



  




 Skallkrav:
 * Minst 3 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling i ServiceNow-miljö.
* Konsulten behöver behärska det svenska språket.


 Börkrav:
 * Erfarenhet av ITSM-processer och lösningar.
* Meriterande om du har arbetat inom offentlig verksamhet.

title: Senior PHP Developer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Jigsaw. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Jigsaw is searching for a PHP expert who thrives in fast-paced environments and is eager to drive technological advancements in the software industry. This role is ideal for someone who excels in PHP development and is passionate about leading teams towards innovation.
   

  

 The software industry often suffers from the slow pace of adopting new technologies and methodologies. At Jigsaw, we distinguish ourselves by rapidly embracing and implementing the latest cloud and PHP technologies. As our subject matter expert, you will be a catalyst in accelerating this shift, moving away from conventional development processes to more agile, efficient practices.
   

  

 Your role will involve leading the development and delivery of cutting-edge PHP solutions both in front-end and back-end services. Your expertise in PHP development will not only contribute to the creation of advanced software solutions, but also drive the strategic direction of our product offerings. You'll play a pivotal role in ensuring our solutions align with client needs and industry trends.
   

  

 Joining Jigsaw means becoming part of a dynamic, forward-thinking company where innovative ideas are valued and professional growth is encouraged. If you're ready to join us in transforming the software domain, apply now!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Spearheading the development of customer-facing UIs and back-end services using PHP, ensuring scalable and efficient solutions
* Taking ownership of end-to-end project delivery, working closely with cross-functional Agile teams
* Guiding and mentoring a talented engineering team, promoting the use of best practices and fostering a culture of technical excellence


**Basic Requirements**
**Senior PHP Developer key responsibilities**
* Must be based in the European Union, United Kingdom, or EEA
* At least 4 years of professional experience in PHP development
* Familiarity with front-end technologies (HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3) and MySQL
* The ability to integrate applications with third-party services using REST APIs with formats like JSON and XML


**About Jigsaw**
 Delivered on a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, Jigsaw’s virtual learning and collaboration technology enables our customers to revolutionize how they train, educate, collaborate and work through a virtual environment – helping them embrace digital transformation and enhance their organizations’ success.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

title: Software Configuration Engineer
description:
At Eaton we are continuously striving to make our world safer, sustainable and efficient in power management. We believe in our employees and we can achieve our goals together. We make what matters work! Join us and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that make a real impact.
   

  

 To find out more about us check: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa\_aiJ4L7
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As Software Configuration Engineer you will be part of an EMEA based team and deliver high level technical support on various client sites across Sweden and EMEA. Your will be mainly working on Energy Power Management System (EPMS), Datacenter Infrastructure Management (DCIM) and SCADA related Eaton software solutions for customer projects. You will bring domain expertise to contribute to following areas of activity of Software based projects:
   

  

* Coordinate SW site deployment and testing (with onsite works if needed) of Eaton solutions in different electrical infrastructures (like data centers, C&I, etc).
* Design technical scope of budgetary and binding proposals
* Resolve the Level 3 escalated technical support requests related to area of expertise.
* Define SW deployment work method with criteria for local team and 3rd party
* Support sales & project management teams with technical scope definition and highlight risks with solutions
* Produce and validate engineering documentation in cooperation with various Eaton technical teams
* Perform internal and external technical presentations and training, also participate in process and tool standardization initiatives.


**Qualifications**
* Degree or equivalent from an accredited institution in Power management/Electrical engineering/Computer science/Automation subjects.
* Experience with Power system automation software, Energy power management system, Data Center Infrastructure management.
* Relevant engineering experience with power management systems specifically within Data Center environment
* Familiar with power distribution system including MV/LV switchgear, Transformer, UPS and EPMS/DCIM system is a plus
* Software and hardware knowledge of PLC, HMI, Network Infrastruction, IED programming and logic control concept is a plus.
* Strong collaboration and solid communication skills in English, other European languages are plus
* Self driven and solution oriented behaviour when solving high complexity technical problems
* A strong safety mindset and the fortitude to STOP unsafe practices even when that could impact other important deliverables
* Intercultural awareness, ability to prioritize and efficiently deal with multiple tight deadlines
* Flexibility with traveling within Sweden and EMEA
* Driving license


**What We Can Offer You**
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Permanent contract in a fast-growing global company.
* Challenging projects in dynamic collaborative team.
* Flexible working solutions.
* We make ethics and culture matter – You will enjoy working in supportive and collaborative workplace where ethics and safety are in our DNA.
* We make your aspirations matter – Eaton encourages internal promotion, whenever possible.
* We make your growth matter - We invest in our employees for the long term – not just with salary and benefits, but with ongoing learning and development opportunities made available through Eaton University.


 We are committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities for job applicants and employees. Our recruitment processes use balanced selection criteria and avoid unlawful discrimination against applicants on the basis of their age, colour, disability, marital status, national origin, gender, gender identity, genetic information, race or racial origin, religion, sexual orientation or any other status protected or required by law.

title: Utvecklare Elastic Stack
description:
Är du en stjärna på Elastic stack med goda kunskaper inom automatisering och monitorering? Vill du jobba med något samhällsviktigt i ett team som tänker långsiktigt? Till kontoret i Stockholm eller Luleå söker vi dig som vill vara med på vår viktiga resa att göra pensioner enklare.
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 I rollen kommer du vara med och bygga vidare på vår gemensamma lösning för loghantering och monitorering. Teamet jobbar agilt och är en del av vårt plattformståg som ansvarar för lösningar som används av hela IT-avdelningen. Vi har som ambition att automatisera vårt arbete redan från början för att undvika att behöva göra samma sak mer än en gång. Allt i linje med DevOps!
   

  

 Teamet samarbetar mycket med andra, för att kunna bygga de tjänster som behövs och skapa förutsättningar för andra. Tillsammans försöker vi hitta enkla lösningar på komplexa problem med hjälp av nya idéer, verktyg och teknik.
   

  

 En vanlig dag börjar med ITs morgonavstämning och teamets daily - någon i teamet får hantera support och drift av Jira och annat som teamet ansvarar för, och du fortsätter jobba med Elastic tillsammans med en kollega.
   

  

 Vi har en välkomnande och hjälpsam kultur, där vi gillar att lära av varandra och våra erfarenheter!
   

  

**Din profil**
 Som person gillar du problemlösning och du utmanas av komplexa frågor. Då vi jobbar i team har du hög samarbetsförmåga där du både delar din kunskap till andra i teamet så väl som tar in andras förslag samt bollar idéer med dina kollegor.
   

  

 Du har även en god förmåga att tänka långsiktigt och se till helheten samtidigt som du är nyfiken och gärna tar initiativ till förbättringar och tittar på ny teknik.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har högskoleutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande relevant erfarenhet samt genomfört större uppgraderingar eller ombyggnad av Elastic Stack On Prem.
   

  

 Du har även aktuell kunskap och god arbetslivserfarenhet av:
   

  

* installation, administration och konfiguration av Elastic Stack On Prem
* Linux, gärna RHEL
* konfigurationshantering, gärna Puppet
* scripting t.ex bash, Python
* användning av Kubernetes och Helm
* goda kunskaper i svenska, i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du har kunskap om
   

  

* arbete med configuration-as-code och GitOps
* Java och/eller Groovy
* drift av Atlassian-sviten (Jira/Confluence/BitBucket)
* användning av Grafana
* användning av Prometheus


 Det är även positivt om du har vana att arbeta i team, med andra team och med ett lean-agilt arbetssätt.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande**
 Ett myndighetsuppdrag som är viktigt på riktigt! En arbetsplats där vi värnar om att våra medarbetare ska ha en god balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi tillämpar hybridarbetssätt med möjlighet till distansarbete och på kontoret utifrån en överenskommelse med arbetsgivaren. Som statligt anställd har du även goda anställningsvillkor och ett förmånspaket med friskvård, flexibel arbetstid, lediga klämdagar samt goda semester- och pensionsvillkor. Vi sitter i ljusa och trevliga lokaler centralt vid Hornstull på Södermalm i Stockholm och i Luleå i ett helt nybyggt kontor i Luleå Science Park på Porsön.
   

  

 Du kan läsa mer om våra förmåner och hur det är att jobba hos oss här.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Anställningen kan komma att placeras i säkerhetsklass.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi jobbar kompetensbaserat i hela processen och är måna om en inkluderande, rättvis, objektiv och kandidatvänlig process. Därför ber vi dig att besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor istället för att be om personligt brev.
   

  

 Vi kan komma att använda oss av arbetspsykologiska tester och arbetsprov.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontakta rekryterande chef som hjälper dig med din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi strävar efter en jämn könsfördelning och ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar därför sökande med olika bakgrund.
   

  

 Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till annonskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför ytterligare kontakt med media-/annonsförsäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.
   

  

 IT-avdelningen består idag av ca 450 medarbetare och du kommer att tillhöra enheten Drift och infrastruktur.
   

  

 Pensionsmyndigheten ansvarar för den allmänna pensionen och informerar om hela pensionen. Varje år betalar vi ut cirka 415 miljarder kronor till 2,3 miljoner pensionärer, genomför cirka 911 000 fondbyten och skickar ut 8 miljoner orange kuvert. Vi har ca 25 miljoner digitala kundkontakter per år. Vi är cirka 1700 medarbetare på åtta orter, från Luleå i norr till Halmstad i söder.
   

  

 #viktigtpåriktigt
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: PSL 2024-84 | Kontakt: Jesper Nyström-Ohlström 010-4544516, | Facklig företrädare: Helena Blomkvist, ST 010-4542853, Anna-Karin Åhrman Cortelius, Saco-s 010-4543914, | Publicerat: 2024-09-04 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-29

title: Streaming Engineer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Streaming Engineer to our Streaming Experience team in our Stockholm office** 
 – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The role**
 As a Streaming Engineer at Viaplay, you will play an important role in working to improve the quality and reliability of our streaming platform. The role is wide and stretches from researching and developing future video- and streaming functionality to daily operational tasks, like investigation of production issues. Together with your team, you will work closely with different stakeholders across Viaplay Group, as well as towards partners and external stakeholders.
   

  

**These are some of the areas you can expect in the role:**
* Manage, optimize and develop our streaming platform to ensure high performance, stability and redundancy
* Manage our encoding and monitoring solutions
* Follow up on QoE statistics and investigate potential issues to find root cause and make improvements
* Optimize video delivery and follow up with our CDN partners
* Work closely with Technical Operations when planning large live events to ensure flawless deliveries
* Assist developers regarding video, audio- and streaming related problems


**What We’re Looking For**
 In the Streaming Experience team, we are a group consisting of streaming- and video engineers, backend developers, a QA Engineer as well as product- and engineering manager. Together we have a passion for streaming and we also like to have fun, both in the office and after hours!
   

  

 We believe that you have a good understanding of the streaming market and relevant technologies. If you have previous experience of working with streaming products - we would be really happy!
   

  

 We understand you may feel confident ticking certain boxes more than others and that’s why we always keep an open mind in our recruitment process. But, in order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:
   

  

* A technical education background or equivalent work experience
* Experience in working with streaming technologies e.g. video encoding, ABR packaging CDN, DRM etc.
* Experience of working with cloud services
* Thrive in sharing knowledge and experience with others
* Solid problem-solving skills
* Strong communication skills and a great team player


**It’s a bonus if you have:** 
  

  

* Developer background


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Senior Software Engineer inom Financial Services
description:
***Bli en del av vårt Blue Harvest team som Senior Software Engineer och var med och förändra finansområdet!***




  





**Om oss:** 




  





 Inom
 **Blue Harvest** 
 är vår ambition att göra skillnad genom kreativitet och teknik. Som en del av Capgemini, är vi ett snabbt växande internationellt mjukvarukonsultföretag. I Stockholm består
 **Blue Harvest** 
 teamet av engagerade kollegor med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter och vi arbetar med de största bank- och försäkringsbolagen. Tillsammans med kollegor från bland annat Belgien, Nederländerna och Tyskland levererar vi innovativa projekt till stora kunder över hela Europa.
 



  





 I rollen ingår att implementera programvaruutvecklingens livscykel enligt bästa praxis med fokus på kvalitetssäkring. Du kommer även att delta i utformningen av tekniska dokument för modeller och dataflöden. Exempelvis kan du utveckla lösningar för betalningar och överföringar inom banktjänster.
 



  





**Get the future you want:** 




  





 För oss är delaktighet och gemenskapen viktig och vi ses så ofta vi kan för gemensamma aktiviteter som lunchträffar, afterworks och kompetensutbyte. Vi stödjer dig med kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, certifieringar och intressanta kunduppdrag för en gedigen karriärutveckling. Samarbete, tillit och en stödjande arbetskultur är centralt för oss inom Blue Harvest.
 



  





**Vi söker dig med:** 




  




* Minst fyra års erfarenhet inom ett programmeringsspråk, gärna Python.
* Erfarenhet av databaser som OracleCB och AMQP, gärna RabbitMQ.
* Erfarenhet av att implementera automatiserad testning, CI/CD tooling med Jenkins eller andra verktyg.
* Kunskap om containerorkestrering som Kubernetes och hantering av mikrotjänstarkitekturer.
* Erfarenhet av multiprocessing och asynkron exekvering är meriterande.
* Affärsförståelse inom finans eller försäkringsområdet är en fördel.



  





**Ansökan:** 




  





 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss. Vi inleder våra processer med att prata om vad du är intresserad av att göra som nästa steg och vi är genuint nyfikna över vilka faktorer som får dig att trivas på jobbet.

title: Senior Principal Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $200,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, LearnwithAI. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.
   

  

 Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
   

  

* TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
* Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
* TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
* Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.


 Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.
   

  

 You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.
   

  

 We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
* Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
* Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
* Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation.


**Senior Principal Software Engineer Key Responsibilities**
* Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.


**Basic Requirements**
* Minimum 5 years of experience in professional software development.
* Minimum 3 years either as a lead engineer reviewing the work of other engineers or as an architect making important technical decisions.
* Excited to use and explore new generative AI tools for software engineering tasks on a day-to-day basis


**About LearnwithAI**
 LearnWith.AI is an edtech startup that leverages AI and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and AI-powered coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $100 USD/hour, which equates to $200,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

title: Backend Developer till Sport och Casino
description:
*Vill du arbeta med utveckling på ett bolag med den senaste tekniken och i ett team där vi har kul på jobbet? Nu finns chansen att få utveckla världens bästa spelupplevelse med oss!* 




  





**I rollen får du:** 




 • Arbeta med drift och nyutveckling av våra system.
 



 • Möjlighet att arbeta med de främsta teknikerna.
 



 • Skapa schyssta spelupplevelser för våra kunder.
 



  





 Till vårt utvecklingsteam inom Sport och Casino söker vi nu en Senior Backend utvecklare. I rollen kommer du att arbeta med både drift och nyutveckling av våra system. För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du värdesätter teamarbete men även eget ansvar. Vidare ser vi att du gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om nya tekniska lösningar eftersom du i denna roll kommer att vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklings- och kvalitetsprocesser. Du kommer att vara en del av ett högpresterande team i vår Sport och Casino del där vi har roligt på jobbet. Vi har dagliga möten och samarbetar tvärfunktionellt med andra team inom IT.
 



  





**Är det här du?** 




 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och för att lyckas som utvecklare hos oss ser vi att du har högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande inom systemutveckling. Du har god förståelse för agila processer och värdesätter effektivitet. För att trivas i den här miljön är du en lagspelare som tycker om att samarbeta. Som person är du lyhörd, nyfiken och tycker om utmaningar. Vidare ser vi att du är prestigelös och gillar att dela med dig av din kunskap. Vi söker dig med en god kommunikativ förmåga på både engelska och svenska, eftersom stora delar av arbetet är på engelska. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av utveckling inom storföretag i en transaktionsintensiv bransch, som bank- eller finansverksamhet eller spelbolag. Har du kunskaper inom test så är även det meriterande för rollen.
 



  





 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av:
 



 • Kotlin
 



 • Java
 



 • GraphQL
 



 • Spring/Spring Boot
 



 • Kubernetes
 



 • OCP4
 



 • AWS
 



 • Test och kvalitet
 



  





**” Mitt mål är att bygga hållbara relationer”** 




 Grunden i mitt ledarskap vilar på tillit till individen, god kommunikation och styrkan i teamets förmågor. Mitt mål är att bygga hållbara relationer, trygghet och tillit till varandras kompetens. Min uppgift som ledare är att skapa förutsättningar för att alla individer i teamet ska kunna växa och få utmanande uppgifter. Personligen sätter jag högt värde vid individuell nyfikenhet, engagemang, kompetens, humor, och viljan att äga uppgiften och leverera tillsammans. Jag har varit anställd på ATG sedan 2018 och har förmånen att vara Manager IT för Sport och Casino. Kulturen, människorna och balansen mellan jobb och fritid är något jag värdesätter starkt på ATG.
 



**- Rekryterande chef, Eva Rylander, Manager IT Sport and Casino** 




  





**We are the game** 




 I närmare 50 år har vi på ATG levererat spänning och underhållning till svenska folket. Vi drivs av att trygga den svenska hästnäringen och att fortsatt vara ett ansvarsfullt spelbolag i framkant. Vår vision att leverera världens bästa spelupplevelse. Hos oss är du en del av en innovativ miljö – med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar vi spelupplevelser i världsklass. Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Sedan starten 1974 har vi byggt och förvaltat systemen för våra produkter som hanterar 4 500 000 transaktioner per dag.
 



  





**Join the game!** 




 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
 



  





 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och kommer att göra en bakgrundskontroll för denna roll. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!

title: DevOps CI Engineer with (Java & python )
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a DevOps CI Engineer with (Java & python )
   

  

 Do you have the skills and passion to succeed in the dynamic world of IT consulting?
 **VIPAS AB** 
 , a growing company, invites you to join us for your next impactful project , . Do you love being in the flow as a developer and want to enable that for everyone else? Do you believe the key to personal flow is making the local developer build experience fast, well-integrated, automated, and with meaningful insights? We are seeking a collaborative and curious Engineer to help drive and develop our CI infrastructure forward.**
**About VIPAS :**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description:**
 Continuous Integration (CI) is at the core of our developer experience. xx's growth and widespread presence have led us to require an ever wider and deeper range of target platforms to run CI against. In a context where early adoption and swift flexibility is at utmost importance we need to provide CI environments that enables us to deliver functionality to our customers with both speed and safety. This role will be part of a team collaboratively creating and owning our CI infrastructure for xx which aims to provide our developers with a streamlined, simple to use, and safe build experience at scale.
   

  

 The role is located in the Platform Developer Experience (PDX) studio within the Platform Mission. The PDX Studio oversees and owns the infrastructure that cuts across all engineering disciplines at xx
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Execute on xx’s future CI infrastructure strategy that can serve 3000+ engineers doing 100’s thousands of builds daily and beyond
   

  

 Support with Operational tasks keeping our systems healthy and up-to-date
   

  

 Drive the automation and improvements of our CI system across our current technical stacks.
   

  

 Help scale our CI infrastructure to support large-scale monorepos.
   

  

 Collaborate with Infrastructure teams across the company to discover what a best-in-class CI infrastructure means.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
 You are an experienced engineer familiar with Linux, MacOS, and Windows as well as Networking fundamentals
   

  

 You are an experienced Software Engineer with Java and Python
   

  

 You have experience deploying and implementing solutions in GCP, Azure, and/or AWS.
   

  

 You believe in iteration and know that finding the right solution is more important than the first.
   

  

 You like to focus on standardization and automation; always looking for ways to improve the developer experience
   

  

 You have 6+ years of experience in building and implementing large-scale systems across various projects and teams
   

  

 You have familiarity with and enthusiasm for software engineering best practices such as testing, continuous integration, and continuous delivery
   

  

**Requirements:**
**Linux, MacOS, and Windows system administration experience
   

  

 HTTP / networking
   

  

 Google Cloud (preferred) / Azure / AWS
   

  

 TeamCity Integrations
   

  

 Ansible
   

  

 Java
   

  

 Python
   

  

 Docker
   

  

 Communication**
**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

**Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathi.hr@vipas.se &contact me at +46764341371/+46 739803973**
 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How to Apply:**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Frontend Developer till Shared Bet Channel
description:

 • vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklings- och kvalitetsprocesser.
 



  





 Vi söker nu en senior frontend-utvecklare till Shared Bet Channel. Välkommen till ett team som har kul tillsammans och som tror på öppenhet och transparens i arbetet. För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har erfarenhet av arbete med agila team och värdesätter effektivitet. Vi har dagliga möten och samarbetar tvärfunktionellt med andra team inom IT. Vidare ser vi att du gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om nya tekniska lösningar eftersom du i denna roll kommer att vara delaktig i att kontinuerligt förbättra teamets utvecklings- och kvalitetsprocesser.

Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Sedan starten 1974 har vi byggt och förvaltat systemen för våra produkter som hanterar 4 500 000 transaktioner per dag.
 



  





**Join the game!** 




 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
 



  





 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och gör bakgrundskontroller för alla roller. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du, beroende på roll, har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!

title: Senior CUDA & GPU Software Engineer to Mycronic!
description:
Think of the most high-tech electronics products you can imagine. Then think one step further. What technology creates the most advanced high-tech of today? Mycronic´s do. With unique and world-leading production solutions, they spearhead the electronics industry. Right now, Mycronic are on a journey of growth, where they continue to explore new markets and expand worldwide and we need to strengthen the software area with GPU competence. Do you have experience in GPU and parallel programming and wants to take the lead within this area? Then you have come to the right place. Read on!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Mycronic AB (publ)
 



  

**City :**
 Täby
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Technology
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 Mycronic is a Swedish high-tech company and has been a trusted partner to electronics and display manufacturers worldwide forover 40 years. They are headquartered in Stockholm, Täby and with subsidiaries, agents and distributors in more than 50 countries. From the very beginning, when Mycronic introduced the world’s first laser-based mask writer, their innovations have been driven by two main sources, their customers and their employees. Currently, there is no other company in the entire world that can compete with Mycronic's technology. All high-resolution screens you see, whether it's a TV, phone, tablet, Apple Watch, etc., they are made with Mycronic’s machines, and this is the technology you will work with. You will work at the very forefront of the electronics industry and work in a mixed team with both junior and experienced developers in C++, Java and C. In addition to your closest team, you will also collaborate in cross-disciplinary projects with engineers in electronics, mechatronics, mechanics, optics and lithography and work together to find the best solutions!
 


  


  

**A few words from one of the Software Group Managers at Mycronic**



  


 " You will face the challenges that are on the cutting edge of todays technology when it comes to parallel processing and GPU accelerated computation. Mycronic is a warm and innovative company fostering an inclusive and diverse culture and we always welcome great minds that think alike 😊”
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* Freedom with responsibility and an opportunity to really make a difference with your competence within GPU
  
* An opportunity to work with the entire development process from gathering requirements to concept, development and testing.
  
* You will be part of a company with a diverse culture and workforce. To Mycronic, diversity is not only a key competitive advantage, but also the very foundation for a great place to work and innovation to happen.
  
* Not only nice colleagues but also high levels of expertise - you will find yourself side by side with some of the leading experts in the electronics industry, getting inspired and inspiring others, as you acquire new knowledge and share it with others across functions and cultures.
  


  


  

**Bringing tomorrow's electronics to life.**



  

  


  

**Work tasks**



  


 The PG (Pattern Generator) division you will belong to has a software organization of 60 employees divided into 7 teams where you will belong to one of them. The role as GPU Software Engineer is new as GPU is a relatively new area for Mycronic that they will heavily invest in the coming years. The goal is to be able to process data even faster and thus deliver more value to their customers. You will be an important part of the work to maximize performance and ensure that you get as much as possible out of the hardware but also to make the product as user-friendly as possible. You will work with the entire development process from start to end and collaborate closely with your colleagues where your ideas will both be appreciated and highlighted and together, you enable tomorrow's electronics production.
   

 Furthermore you will..
 


  

  
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement GPU-accelerated algorithms and applications.
  
* Optimize existing software for GPU architectures to maximize performance and efficiency.
  
* Conduct research and development to explore new techniques and technologies in GPU computing.
  
* Perform code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure high-quality deliverables.
  
* Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in GPU technology and CUDA programming.
  

  


**We are looking for**

 In this recruitment, we will place great emphasis on your personal qualities and interest in Mycronic as a company and this specific position. Empazise in your application why you are interested.
 


  


 Furthermore, you have…
 


  

  
* At least a bachelor's degree in computer technology, electronics or similar
  
* Several years of experience in the field
  
* Strong knowledge in CUDA programming and GPU architecture
  
* An understand of parallel programming
  
* Knowledge in C/C++
  


  


 We see it as a merit if you have…
 


  

  
* Knowledge in OpenCL or Vulkan
  
* Knowledge in TensorFlow or PyTorch
  
* Knowledge in OpenGL, DirectX or similar
  


  


  

**Other information**



  

  
* Start: According to agreement
  
* Work extent: Full-time
  
* Location: Täby, possibility to work from home a couple of days a week
  
* Contact details: Johanna Sörell, Senior Recruitment Consultant, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se
  
* This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and the request from Mycronic is that all questions about the recruitment process goes to Academic Work. Apply through Academic Works website.
   

 ·
  


  


  

**The recruitment process**



  

  
* Phone interview with Academic Work
  
* Teams interview with Academic Work, personality test + problem solving test
  
* Interviews with Mycronic
  
* Reference checking + decision
  


  

  

  

  

  

**Mycronic AB (publ)**

 Read more about Mycronic on their website: https://www.mycronic.com/​
   




**Get directly recruited to Mycronic AB (publ)**

 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Johanna Sörell or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stn05@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105420

title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally.
